resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108322</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108322</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206416</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Powers of Persuasion -- Poster Art of World War II</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energien der Überzeugung -- Plakat-kunst des 
Zweiten Weltkrieges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissances de la persuasion -- art d'affiche de la
deuxième guerre mondiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potências do persuasion -- arte do poster da 
segunda guerra mundial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenzi di persuasione -- arte del manifesto della
seconda guerra mondiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις της πειθούς -- τέχνη αφισών του παγκόσμιου 
πολέμου ΙΙ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potencias de la persuasión -- arte del cartel de 
la Segunda Guerra Mundial</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides a standards-based lesson on how the use of posters during WWII helped win over the hearts and minds of the American people.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt eine Standard-gegründete Lektion auf zur 
Verfügung, wie der Gebrauch der Plakate während WWII Gewinn über 
den Inneren und dem Verstand der amerikanischen Leute half.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit une leçon norme-basée sur la façon dont
l'utilisation des affiches pendant le WWII a aidé la victoire 
au-dessus des coeurs et des esprits des  américains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece uma lição padrão-baseada em como o uso 
dos posteres durante WWII ajudou à vitória sobre os corações e as 
mentes dos povos americanos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce una lezione standard-basata su come l'uso
dei manifesti durante il WWII ha aiutato la vittoria sopra i cuori e 
le menti della gente americana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει ένα πρότυπο-βασισμένο στα μάθημα στον τρόπο 
με τον οποίο η χρήση των αφισών κατά τη διάρκεια WWII που 
ενισχύονται να κερδίσουν πέρα από τις καρδιές και τα μυαλά των 
αμερικανικών ανθρώπων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a una lección esta'ndar-basada en 
cómo el uso de carteles durante WWII ayudó a triunfo sobre los 
corazones y las mentes de la gente americana.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206416</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108322</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/powers-of-persuasion-poster-art-of-world-war-ii</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
